body.p: By the time fluid reaches the end of the distal tubule, the solutes and water have been reabsorbed.

response.feedback: Incorrect. More than half of the solutes and water have been reabsorbed.
Incorrect. More than one quarter of the solutes and water have been reabsorbed.
Incorrect. More than three quarters of the solutes and water have been reabsorbed.
Correct. By the time fluid reaches the end of the distal tubule, 90 to 95 percent of solutes and water have been reabsorbed.
